summary: With this mod you can summon 2 Cyrodiilian Black/Brown Bears + 3 Bears + 3 Dovahbears + 3 Armored Dovahbears + 4 Pandas + 1 Snow Armored bear + 1 Spectral bear, Mounts and Followers wherever you want. You can find 10 Companions in the Windhelm Stable ( a Brown + 3 Dovahbears + 2 Pandas) and in Windhelm (3 Armored Dovahbears + 1 Armored DovahPanda)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"] Bears Mounts and Followers[/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]version 2.0

Optional File: Esp Version Française [/color]

[color=#ff0000] Video with this mod[/color] (The adventures of Pablo, the companion bear of Brad !)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]cg03sv8V8lY[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ZHmJbtc.gif[/img]

"Bears" allow you to summon 2 Cyrodiilian Black/Brown Bears + 3 Bears + 3 Dovahbears (Brown + Black + Snow) + 3 Armored Dovahbears (Brown + Black + Snow) + 4 Pandas (panda, armored panda, armored dovahpanda, dovahpanda) + 1 Snow armored bear + 1 Spectral bear, Mounts and -simple- Followers wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Bear"

You can find the 10 -complete- (with speech) Followers in the Windhelm Stable ( a Brown + 3 Dovahbears, Brown, Black and Snow + 2 Pandas) and in Windhelm (3 Armored Dovahbears + 1 Armored DovahPanda)

No DLC required !

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=287513SummonBearSMountSandFollowerS.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/287513SummonBearSMountSandFollowerS.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=844174pandasmountsfollowers2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/844174pandasmountsfollowers2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) [size="7"][color=#ff0000] You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "[/color][/size]

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 18 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Bear" and the “Spell tome: Summon Spectral Bear”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Spectral Bear)


4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=966412dovahbearmountfollower3.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/966412dovahbearmountfollower3.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

3) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=699684SummonBearsMountandFollower.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/699684SummonBearsMountandFollower.jpg[/img][/url]
